name: Infiltrating a Cult
description:
*All characters in this game are 18 or older

[Plot]
Your mission is to infiltrate a cult with your master.
One night, you decide to make a move to finish them off.
After leaving the dorms, you successfully snuck into the church, but then...

[System]
Simple turn-based battle.
Use various skills like strong attack and consecutive attack to take down the followers.
In order to find The Leader and take down the church,
you must first fight the 4 captains to get clues about her whereabouts...
Work with your master and fight the followers of the cult to take down the church once and for all!
- Messages can be skipped
- Save anywhere in the game
